messages.speaker: Garran Whitlock
messages.text: Get out of my face BOY!

choices.text: You look like you could use a hand. What's the trouble?
Aye… you don't look as spry as you once were. Tell me what needs done.

messages.speaker: Garran Whitlock
messages.text: Ah… 'tis good of ye to offer! My shoulder's ailing, and I can't swing an axe like I used to. There are trees near the edge of the woods that need felling 'fore the winter frost sets in. I'd be grateful for a strong arm such as yours.
